title: Content-Box
description: Component to display content in a condensed, boxed form

ratio.title: Image ratio
ratio.description: Choose one of the set ratios, all ratios except `none` stretch the image to 100% width

alignement.title: Image alignment
alignement.description: Choose an alignment for the image inside its box, only applies for a `ratio` value of `none`

image.title: Image source
image.description: Select an image to display inside the content box, at the top

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Topic for the content box. Displayed before the text, in bold
